about.description:
Pyrovelocity: A multivariate RNA Velocity model to estimate future cell
states with uncertainty using probabilistic modeling with pyro.

- docs: [https://pyrovelocity.readthedocs.io](https://pyrovelocity.readthedocs.io)
- source: [https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity](https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity)

PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/pyrovelocity](https://pypi.org/project/pyrovelocity)
about.summary: Probabilistic modeling of RNA Velocity with pyro.

about.description:
Pyrovelocity: A multivariate RNA Velocity model to estimate future cell
states with uncertainty using probabilistic modeling with pyro.

- docs: [https://pyrovelocity.readthedocs.io](https://pyrovelocity.readthedocs.io)
- source: [https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity](https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity)

PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/pyrovelocity](https://pypi.org/project/pyrovelocity)
about.summary: Probabilistic modeling of RNA Velocity with pyro.

name: pyrovelocity
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyrovelocity" %}
{% set version = "0.2.0b11.dev1" %}

{% set gitorg = "pinellolab" %}
# {% set gittag = "v0.2.0-beta.10" %}
# {% set gitref = "beta" %}
{% set gitrev = "dac426b7e1e73511e03aef7dfe68088479a70c58" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  # source archive from PyPI for release to main label
  # url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  # sha256: a9606b86d4ce29a71b1dc6f658c0e9d88339823de84be29c8d59244a3bc5fbcd

  # source archive from git tag/ref/rev for testing/release to _dev label
  # url: https://github.com/{{ gitorg }}/{{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/{{ gittag }}.tar.gz
  # url: https://github.com/{{ gitorg }}/{{ name }}/archive/refs/heads/{{ gitref }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/{{ gitorg }}/{{ name }}/archive/{{ gitrev }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1be61bd443155e7d3861970653dceb96cf5378624a5e2dcb5bf40cd7b273ca9d

build:
  entry_points:
    - pyrovelocity=pyrovelocity.workflows.cli:main
  noarch: python
  script: |
    {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.10,<3.11
    - pip
    - poetry-core >=1.6.0
  run:
    - python >=3.10,<3.11
    - adjusttext >=0.7.3
    - anndata >=0.10.5
    - astropy >=5.2.2
    - beartype >=0.16.4
    - click >=8.1.7
    - colorlog >=6.7.0
    - flax >=0.6.1
    - h5py >=3.8.0
    - hydra-core >=1.3.2
    - jax >=0.4.13,<=0.4.23
    - jaxlib >=0.4.12,<=0.4.23
    - jaxtyping >=0.2.25
    - leidenalg >=0.9.1
    - lightning >=2.0.0
    - mlflow >=2.10.0
    - omegaconf >=2.3.0
    - pandas >=1.5.3
    - pyro-ppl >=1.8.6
    - pytorch >=2.0.0
    - pyyaml >=6.0.1
    - returns >=0.22.0
    - rich >=12.6.0
    - scanpy >=1.9.8
    - scipy >=1.10.1
    - scvelo >=0.3.1
    - scvi-tools >=1.1.1
    - seaborn >=0.13.2
    - termcolor >=2.2.0
    - torchmetrics >=1.2.1
    - validators >=0.22.0
    - zstandard >=0.21.0

test:
  imports:
    - pyrovelocity
  commands:
    - pytest -rA --xdoc --no-cov --disable-warnings -k "not workflows" --pyargs pyrovelocity
  requires:
    - hypothesis
    - pytest
    - pytest-cov
    - pytest-mock
    - requests-mock
    - xdoctest

about:
  home: https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity
  summary: Probabilistic modeling of RNA Velocity with pyro.
  license: AGPL-3.0-only
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    Pyrovelocity: A multivariate RNA Velocity model to estimate future cell
    states with uncertainty using probabilistic modeling with pyro.

    - docs: [https://pyrovelocity.readthedocs.io](https://pyrovelocity.readthedocs.io)
    - source: [https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity](https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity)

    PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/pyrovelocity](https://pypi.org/project/pyrovelocity)

  dev_url: https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity
  doc_url: https://pyrovelocity.readthedocs.io
  doc_source_url: https://github.com/pinellolab/pyrovelocity/blob/main/README.md

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - cameronraysmith
    - qinqian
